thread.title: Lovely hotel - great for family
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel - great for family - Review of Raffaello Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Dmomwow
title: Lovely hotel - great for family
text: We stayed at this hotel in March 2017 with two school age kids. Our room was clean and had beds for 3 (they did not have a larger room) but we managed. The breakfast was lovely and was the all day coffee service. We were able to walk easily to/from the train station with our luggage and walked to all the sites from this hotel. Would highly recommend
